edu.washington.cs.cse490h.lib
Class SynopticLogger

java.lang.Object
  edu.washington.cs.cse490h.lib.SynopticLogger

public class SynopticLogger
extends java.lang.Object

Class to handle logging of Synoptic events. This class used in both simulation and emulation modes.
